sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"假设，假想"之意。
means: hypothesis ： 书面用词，指有待作进一步检验或证实的假设。
assumption ： 侧重主观推测或主观设想。
presumption ： 着重指以可能性为依据的假设。
supposition可与assumption换用，还可表某种试探性的主观看法或建议。

sentence.Network_en: There is a general presumption that the doctor knows best.
sentence.Network_cn: 一般人都以为医生最了解情况。

sentence.Network_en: The presumption is that he had lost his way.
sentence.Network_cn: 推想起来,他当时是迷了路.

sentence.Network_en: I don't think that's a false presumption.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为那并不是错误的推测.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... presume v 假定；自以为是 presumption n 假定；专横 sumptuous a 奢侈的.
所谓推定（presumption），是指依照法律规定或者由法院按照经验法则，从已知的基础事实推断未知的推定事实的存在，并允许当事 …
四六级阅读词汇 - 豆丁网 ... presume||假定 presumption||推测 preview||事先查看.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... resumption 重新开始 presumption 假定，冒昧 eruption 爆发.

list.abs: 会计&财务术语的... ... realize the value 实现价值 rebuttable presumption 可予驳回的推定 receipts for services 服务的收入.
presumptive area 预定区域presumptive map 原基分布图presynaptic 突触前的
1. presumptive instructionpresumptive address 基本地址，基准地址presuperheater 预过热器
H ... heir at law 法定继承人， heir presumptive 假定继承人 heiress 女继承人.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French presumpcion, from Latin praesumptio(n) 'anticipation', from the verb praesumere (see presume)

entry.def: A presumption is something that is accepted as true but is not certain to be true.

example.ex: ...the presumption that a defendant is innocent until proved guilty...
example.tran: 被告在被证实有罪之前都被视为无罪的假定

example.ex: I'm having to make a lot of presumptions since I don't really know anything about the case.
example.tran: 事实上我对这个案件一无所知，很多观点都只能是假设。

entry.def: If you describe someone's behaviour as presumption, you disapprove of it because they are doing something that they have no right to do.

example.ex: They were angered by his presumption.
example.tran: 他们对他的放肆感到非常愤怒。

means.word_mean: 1. an assumption that is taken for granted
2. (law) an inference of the truth of a fact from other facts proved or admitted or judicially noticed
3. audacious (even arrogant) behavior that you have no right to;
4. a kind of discourtesy in the form of an act of presuming;

auth_sentence.content: The presumption will be that there should be none.
auth_sentence.res_content: The presumption will be that there should be none.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The presumption will be that there should be none.

auth_sentence.content: This presumption does not necessarily apply in all cases.
auth_sentence.res_content: This presumption does not necessarily apply in all cases.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This presumption does not necessarily apply in all cases.

auth_sentence.content: Only a presumption that they will be contaminated.
auth_sentence.res_content: Only a presumption that they will be contaminated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Only a presumption that they will be contaminated.

stems_affixes.word_buile: sumpt拿,取+uous多……的→[把钱]拿出去→奢侈的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 假定,设想;采取;承担;推测;假装
stems_affixes.word_buile: as加强动作+sumpt拿,取+ion表名词→拿住→认为是……[假定]
con共同+sumpt拿,取+ion表名词→全拿完→消耗
pre预先+sumpt拿,取+ion表名词→预先拿→假定

means.word_mean: 假定, 认定, 推测

sentences.en: I don’t think that’s a false presumption.
sentences.cn: 我认为那并不是错误的推测。
